name: Firecoal
description: This magical world has made you part of the fire. Your task is to cut trees and put them in the fire until it goes out Trees must be cut 3 times (LButton mouse) and they must be brought to the fire WSAD - Move There are lanterns on the map that can be eaten to replenish life Live as much time and luck as possible) P.s is my first game so criticism is welcome Discord: Erbi # 3025
